column1: Dagestanskiye Ogni (Russian: Дагеста́нские Огни́) (Lezgian: Дагъустандин ЦӀаяр) is a town in the Republic of Dagestan
column3: located on the coast of the Caspian Sea
column4: 120 kilometers (75 mi) south of Makhachkala. Population: 27

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: it is incorporated as the Town of Dagestanskiye Ogni—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column3: the Town of Dagestanskiye Ogni is incorporated as Dagestanskiye Ogni Urban Okrug.

column1: Dagestanskiye Ogni has a cold semi-arid climate (Köppen climate classification: BSk).
Народное Собрание Республики Дагестан. Закон №16 от 10 апреля 2002 г. «Об административно-территориальном устройстве Республики Дагестан»
